#1685: 1469, I'm really sorry you have to go through that; I know just what you mean. I still can't put most of my favorite pictures from senior prom up on Facebook, and I couldn't tell most of my family I actually went with someone, because the person I went to prom with was a guy, just like me. It never feels good to feel like you have to hide someone who is important to you from your family, whether it's parents like in your situation, or aunts, uncles, and grandparents like in mine. Hang in there; the world is changing fast, and maybe someday he'll feel comfortable just telling them the truth and you can at least be open about it together, regardless of the outcome.

I can relate to what you're going through. I made some mistakes that have been ruling my life too. I could lose my entire future because of some bad decisions. You just want it to be over and move on but it doesn't end. Message me and we can talk. I'm always here to listen.

Fight through the pain. If you have to "withdraw", withdraw. Legal trouble is the concrete version of these problems, everything else is IN YOUR MIND. Literally, don't let pain and negativity manifest itself unnecessarily.

data.story: "#1519: When I think of..." on their own status.

data.message: #1519: When I think of "secrets," I think of just that: secrets. Not shout outs to who you think is the hottest guy on campus, questions about the sexual motives of women or men, or attacks on peers or student organizations. So, in the recent spirit of this page, I'm going to bitch a little bit right now. Take your unrequited love to UMiami compliments/admirers, and stop bashing Greek life and making personal attacks on people across campus. Especially tiara girl. If she wants to wear a tiara and it bothers you, don't fuckin look at it. Is Greek life really pissing you off lately? Remember that 80% of the leadership positions on campus are held by members of a Greek organization, and look back to Greek Week last semester where we (duh, I am one of those awful people) raised 35,000 for charity in very a short period of time - just a tiny reflection of how much money we raise annually for our individual philanthropies. Don't be such a spiteful person just because not everyone has the same interests as you.

I am the only one who, despite loving the structure and complexity of this response, quit actually reading it in order to search for the closing parenthesis that is missing?

Ps, can we just make a Miami Greek War page and let all of the 'haters' and Greeks battle it out there? Granted, this seems like more of a Roman approach than Greek, but I think a compromise is in order.
*am I

#1668: At 1519, while your "secret" started off as decided neutral it devolved into a sore defense of Greek life. You pretend to be neutral and use that bait and switch as a segway into a defense of Greek life which utterly disgusts me; at the very least you have an inability to recognize the fact that your post exhibits a conflict of interest which detracts from your credibility. Now I would like to examine your arguments a bit more closely. 80% is a fine statistic,  but I want to see hard data backing it up (ex. List of all or nearly all of the leadership positions on campus and their Greek or non-Greek affiliation. And then I'd wanna look at if this phenomenon is self-reinforcing in the same token as how Hecht is the party dorm each year relative to Stanford. Also on the 80% I don't think premed Greeks should count because imo they are not the Greeks that the student population takes issue with. Finally,  your last sentence uses ad hominem which reflects poorly on you,  and by extension the Greek organization you are from, whichever it may be. While Greeks have been taking a lot of flak recently, it doesn't help your cause and lowers you to the level of your dirtiest critics when you respond in kind.
Hahaha well said! And a little tip: a girl will respect you if you don't try to sleep with her the first time you meet! Ask her on a date! A nice date! Plan something sweet! 😊

data.name: UMiami Missed Connections

data.message: The point of us posting the missed connections post here is because everyone looks at these. Not the missed connections page. The girl with the yellow balloon ain't gonna see my post over there son!
Also, if you submitted something to UMiami Secrets that will fit better at UMiami Missed Connections, check for it there!
Thank you!

In order to cut down on the posts that aren't really "secrets", I made a UMiami Missed Connections page.  Check it out, like it, and share it, please!  

Remember that cute girl who you made eye contact with in the stacks, but were too shy to say anything? Or that dreamy guy who smiled at you in Cox, but you were lost for words? Or perhaps that horrible professor who you'd like to lash out at?

On this page, you can acknowledge anyone on campus who you don't know very well, or don't even know their name, and exchange those romantic or frustrating thoughts and feelings. And the best part is, it's COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS.
https://www.facebook.com/UMiamiMissedConnections
data.description:

the rankings are due in large part to the reputation of the faculty (partially from research and publications) and the incoming SAT and class rank of freshmen, which has been rising.. it seems that 2010, our high water point may have been an outlier and these past two years have been more of a regression to a still-climbing mean
^that sizzling sound? Yup. From that burn. And I ain't even Greek!

It's because of retention and financial politics- Miami is expensive and a tougher city (like New York) to survive in- a lot of students drop out. Also- money for the school triumphs over quality of under privileged students.The school gets over 15K in addition to the full tuition International students pay. The Chinese students take an intensive English course then take the Toefl BEFORE 4 years at UM.  UM gets the English course money AND their full tuition. Many of these students struggle in English classes (as told by English professors). It isn't about Greek Life lol. Every issue on campus revolves around the dollar bill.
This entire group/site whatever the fuck it is, is really fucking stupid and should be stopped. I really don't want this bullshit on my newsfeed anymore
